FuncDef: This command configures the service path identifier and service index to be inserted in NSH in the steered traffic if the forward action indicates NSH insertion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 24-bit path ID in the base part of NSH. Values-0 to 16777215.
Specifies the 8-bit service index inserted in the base part of NSH. Values-0 to 255.
